rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area with Mediterranean design elements such as terracotta tiles, arches and a central hearth. Includes large windows for natural light and wheelchair accessible paths.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with Mediterranean color palette and open layout. Designed to be wheelchair friendly with lower countertops and accessible cabinetry.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom includes a walk-in closet and is positioned according to Vastu principles for positive energy flow. Doors are wide enough to accommodate wheelchair access.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A compact guest bedroom with space-saving furniture and accessible design features.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with ergonomic furniture and soundproofing for a quiet work environment. Includes built-in storage and is designed to be wheelchair friendly.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible bathroom with safety fixtures, grab bars, and non-slip tiles following local building norms.

openings.description: Alternate entrance designed for wheelchair access.
